医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的人工智能模型提高了乳腺癌手术中肿瘤切除的准确性人工智能（AI）和机器学习工具最近受到了广泛关注，大多数讨论都集中在正确使用上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/New-AI-model-improves-accuracy-of-tumor-removal-in-breast-cancer-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/New-AI-model-improves-accuracy-of-tumor-removal-in-breast-cancer-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f3cd9cf-6bc3-4a02-90fa-f3c97ac508a5 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 20:52:49 -0400 New AI model improves accuracy of tumor removal in breast cancer surgery
环境和职业因素会影响精液质量吗？新研究揭示了环境和职业因素如何影响男性生育能力，表明靠近电线可能会提高精液质量，而住在化工厂附近可能会有害。该研究强调在不孕率上升的背景下需要更深入地了解这些因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Do-environmental-and-occupational-factors-influence-semen-quality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Do-environmental-and-occupational-factors-influence-semen-quality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dff8c4e-4c39-4545-8036-dd1101cd0014 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 20:50:00 -0400 Do environmental and occupational factors influence semen quality?
放射治疗联合两种免疫治疗可有效对抗冷肿瘤威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员发现，放射疗法与两种类型的免疫疗法相结合——一种是增强 T 细胞，另一种是增强树突状细胞——可以控制三阴性乳腺癌临床前模型中的肿瘤，三阴性乳腺癌是一种通常具有耐药性的癌症类型单独进行免疫治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Radiation-therapy-combined-with-two-types-of-immunotherapy-could-be- effective-against-cold-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Radiation-therapy-combined-with-two-types-of-immunotherapy-could-be- effective-against-cold-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13621cd5-06af-4913-8134-0a15e42a3841 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 20:37:14 -0400 Radiation therapy combined with two types of immunotherapy could be effective against cold tumors
AI模型准确预测普​​通肺癌术后患者预后研究人员开发了一种人工智能模型，可以准确预测非小细胞肺癌患者术后的预后。该模型利用了一系列术前和术后血液检测结果，实现了很高的预测准确性，为个性化治疗计划提供了一种有前景的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/AI-model-accurately-forecasts-病人-结果-for-common-lung-cancer-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/AI-model-accurately-forecasts- Patient-outcomes-for-common-lung-cancer-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee4b6710-b70d-4a3f-a2ef-2c653d3d1102 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 20:33:00 -0400 AI model accurately forecasts patient outcomes for common lung cancer after surgery
研究可能会导致开发出模仿运动的新型减肥药一种全新的药物在小鼠身上进行了测试，显示出有希望的新结果，可能会导致开发一种模仿运动的新型减肥药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Research-could-lead-to-the-development-of-new-weight-loss-drug-that-mimics-exercise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Research-could-lead-to-the-development-of-new-weight-loss-drug-that-mimics-exercise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d26df4ef-b558-41bb-8e7e-6b124848af66 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 20:28:27 -0400 Research could lead to the development of new weight-loss drug that mimics exercise
工程小鼠揭示了 Omicron 亚变体 BA.5 为何毒性更强新研究使用工程小鼠来比较 SARS-COV-2 omicron 亚变体，发现其中一种——BA.5——毒性更强，可能是因为它能够在感染早期快速复制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Engineered-mice-reveal-how-Omicron-subvariant-BA5-is-more-virulent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Engineered-mice-reveal-how-Omicron-subvariant-BA5-is-more-virulent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4c8dc83-315f-4346-b6d1-56fa30baff7d Mon, 25 Sep 2023 20:21:16 -0400 Engineered mice reveal how Omicron subvariant BA.5 is more virulent
康普茶有望降低 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖水平乔治城大学医院最近进行的一项临床试验表明，康普茶可能具有作为抗高血糖药物的潜力，可以降低成年 2 型糖尿病患者的空腹血糖水平。虽然结果令人鼓舞，但需要进行更大样本量的进一步研究，以巩固康普茶在治疗糖尿病方面的健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Kombucha-tea-shows-promise-in-lowering-blood-sugar-levels-for-type-2-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Kombucha-tea-shows-promise-in-lowering-blood-sugar-levels-for-type-2-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19370390-fdf1-4a21-80ef-5808b8bfdf12 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 20:21:00 -0400 Kombucha tea shows promise in lowering blood sugar levels for type 2 diabetics
可穿戴式血糖监测仪揭示糖尿病患者的血糖管理模式《科学进展》杂志上达特茅斯学院的一项新研究表明，糖尿病患者控制血糖的能力取决于他们的病情经验、控制血糖水平的总体成功率，以及季节和一天中的时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Wearable-glucose-monitors-reveal-patterns-in-blood-sugar-management-in-people-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Wearable-glucose-monitors-reveal-patterns-in-blood-sugar-management-in-people-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df92868b-d8a5-43b5-9512-f8d2943b4cb5 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 20:12:59 -0400 Wearable glucose monitors reveal patterns in blood sugar management in people with diabetes
使用 alpelisib 治疗的乳腺癌患者高血糖发生率升高新的研究发现，接受口服药物 alpelisib 治疗的乳腺癌患者的高血糖或高血糖发生率升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Breast-cancer-病人-treatment-with-alpelisib-have-elevated-rates-of-high-blood-sugar.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Breast-cancer-病人-treatment-with-alpelisib-have-elevated-rates-of-high-blood-sugar.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ea29f67-e1f0-42e1-92ac-f4e98009f5e5 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 19:57:10 -0400 Breast cancer patients treated with alpelisib have elevated rates of high blood sugar
种族在确定女性早期绝经后患 2 型糖尿病的风险中发挥着关键作用昆士兰大学的研究发现，种族在决定女性绝经早期后患 2 型糖尿病的风险方面发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Ethnicity-plays-a-key-role-in-determining-womans-type-2-diabetes-risk-after-early-menopause.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Ethnicity-plays-a-key-role-in-determining-womans-type-2-diabetes-risk-after-early-menopause.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=793db3ca-e47f-4ea0-a481-a592cc82cad8 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 19:28:50 -0400 Ethnicity plays a key role in determining woman's type 2 diabetes risk after early menopause
